name: Lyla
description:
A short narrative puzzle about a lady named Lyla & the mystery behind her dreams.

Contains:

  • Fog
  • Green slime
  • Elements of psychological horror & dark/mature themes
    **If you wish to view a list of trigger warnings, highlight the concealed text below. If not, avoid doing so as it may spoil the plot.
    Sexual themes

Created for the first year anniversary of 48 Secret Jam. Art, music, plot & sound effects by Kaelyn Mauve.
